author: arkurth
msg: Fixed bug in Linux.pm's get_available_space and get_total_space subroutines. It now attempts to determine the block size by checking for either the 'Block size:' or 'Size:' value in the 'stat -f' output.  Some versions only display 'Size:'.

Added error checking to VMware.pm in locations where it calls get_available_space. It wasn't checking to make sure a value was returned. As a result, divide by 0 errors occurred if available space couldn't be determined.

author: sf
msg: More style fixes, no func changes

author: daijy
msg: PIG-2237: LIMIT generates wrong number of records if pig determines no of reducers as more than 1
